name: mother and child
description:
One of the strange phenomena of creation is the "mother". Undoubtedly, the mother is one of the most unique creatures of God, and among the known human loves, "motherly love" is the strongest human love and affection. It has happened many times that in different incidents, a mother is willing to sacrifice her life to save or save her child! Or tried to save his child by endangering himself.
Undoubtedly, the mother is the "irreplaceable miracle of creation."
This is my artwork from a mother who is hugging her child.
